NK041(di)020:0: mnyam nyid mi g.yo mnyam nyid mchog gi chos nyid can //
NK041(di)020:1: thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad //
NK041(di)020:2: yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa //
NK041(di)020:3: dri med mi g.yo mnyam med dam pa'i mchog chos can //
NK041(di)020:4: yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang tshad med de //
NK041(di)020:5: dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang 'gran du yod ma yin //
NK041(di)020:6: dngos grub rnam gnyis mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams //
NK041(di)020:7: sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol //
NK041(di)020:8: rtag tu dri ma med pa thugs rje'i shugs las byung //
NK041(di)020:9: smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can //
NK041(di)020:10: 'gro ba'i don grub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa //
NK041(di)020:11: thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang //
NK041(di)020:12: tshad med tshad dang bral ba shin tu yongs rdzogs pa'i //
NK041(di)020:13: bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa brnyes gyur kyang //
NK041(di)020:14: khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi //
NK041(di)020:15: thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yod mi 'gyur //
NK041(di)020:17: shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan //
NK041(di)020:18: mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang nas go 'phang mchog brnyes pa //
NK041(di)020:19: khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad //
NK041(di)020:20: mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pas //
NK041(di)020:21: dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol //
NK041(di)020:22: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK041(di)020:23: yang dag yon tan rgya chen te //
NK041(di)020:24: lan gcig tsam zhig brjod pas kyang //
